verses.verse: וּמַֽלְכַּת־ <S%H4436><s%> And when the queen שְׁבָ֗א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba שָֽׁמְעָה֮ <S%H8085><s%> heard אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for שֵׁ֣מַע <S%H8088><s%> of the fame שְׁלֹמֹה֒ <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon וַתָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> she came לְנַסּוֹת֩ <S%H5254><s%> to prove אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁלֹמֹ֨ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon בְחִיד֜וֹת <S%H2420><s%> with hard questions בִּירֽוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem בְּחַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> company כָּבֵ֣ד <S%H3515><s%> great מְאֹ֡ד <S%H3966><s%> with a very וּ֠גְמַלִּים <S%H1581><s%> and camels נֹשְׂאִ֨ים <S%H5375><s%> that bare בְּשָׂמִ֧ים <S%H1314><s%> spices וְזָהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold לָרֹ֖ב <S%H7230><s%> in abundance וְאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרָ֑ה <S%H3368><s%> and precious וַתָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and when she was come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> she communed עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הָיָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> was on לְבָבָֽהּ׃ <S%H3824><s%> with him of all that was in her heart

וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> told לָ֥הּ שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> And Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּבָרֶ֑יהָ <S%H1697><s%> her all her questions וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נֶעְלַ֤ם <S%H5956><s%> and there was nothing hid דָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> her questions מִשְּׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> from Solomon אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֦א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִגִּ֖יד <S%H5046><s%> which he told לָֽהּ׃

וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <S%H7200><s%> had seen מַֽלְכַּת־ <S%H4436><s%> And when the queen שְׁבָ֔א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> חָכְמַ֣ת <S%H2451><s%> the wisdom שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon וְהַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> and the house אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בָּנָֽה׃ <S%H1129><s%> that he had built

וּמַאֲכַ֣ל <S%H3978><s%> And the meat שֻׁלְחָנ֡וֹ <S%H7979><s%> of his table וּמוֹשַׁ֣ב <S%H4186><s%> and the sitting עֲבָדָיו֩ <S%H5650><s%> of his servants וּמַעֲמַ֨ד <S%H4612><s%> and the attendance מְשָׁרְתָ֜יו <S%H8334><s%> of his ministers וּמַלְבּֽוּשֵׁיהֶ֗ם <S%H4403><s%> and their apparel וּמַשְׁקָיו֙ <S%H4945><s%> his cupbearers וּמַלְבּ֣וּשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H4403><s%> also and their apparel וַעֲלִיָּת֔וֹ <S%H5930><s%> and his stairway אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> by which he went up בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again בָּ֖הּ רֽוּחַ׃ <S%H7307><s%> there was no more spirit

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And she said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> to the king אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> [It was] a true הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> report אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> which I heard בְּאַרְצִ֑י <S%H776><s%> in mine own land עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about דְּבָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H1697><s%> of thine acts וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> about חָכְמָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2451><s%> and of thy wisdom

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הֶאֱמַ֣נְתִּי <S%H539><s%> Howbeit I believed לְדִבְרֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1697><s%> not their words עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I בָּ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> until I came וַתִּרְאֶ֣ינָה <S%H7200><s%> had seen עֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> and mine eyes וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> and behold לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> was not הֻגַּד־ <S%H5046><s%> was not told לִ֔י חֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> [it] and behold the one half מַרְבִּ֣ית <S%H4768><s%> of the greatness חָכְמָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H2451><s%> of thy wisdom יָסַ֕פְתָּ <S%H3254><s%> me [for] thou exceedest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַשְּׁמוּעָ֖ה <S%H8052><s%> the fame אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> i שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H8085><s%> that I heard

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> Happy אֲנָשֶׁ֔יךָ <S%H376><s%> are your men וְאַשְׁרֵ֖י <S%H835><s%> and happy עֲבָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H5650><s%> [are] these thy servants אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these הָעֹמְדִ֤ים <S%H5975><s%> which stand לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6440><s%> before תָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> continually וְשֹׁמְעִ֖ים <S%H8085><s%> thee and hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חָכְמָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2451><s%> thy wisdom

יְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God בָּר֔וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> who חָפֵ֣ץ <S%H2654><s%> which delighted בְּךָ֗ לְתִתְּךָ֤ <S%H5414><s%> in thee to set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כִּסְאוֹ֙ <S%H3678><s%> thee on his throne לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [to be] king לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּאַהֲבַ֨ת <S%H160><s%> loved אֱלֹהֶ֤יךָ <S%H430><s%> because thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Israel לְהַעֲמִיד֣וֹ <S%H5975><s%> to establish לְעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> them for ever וַיִּתֶּנְךָ֤ <S%H5414><s%> therefore made עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> over לְמֶ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> he thee king לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> over them to do מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> and justice

וַתִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> And she gave לַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים ׀ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty כִּכַּ֣ר <S%H3603><s%> talents זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וּבְשָׂמִ֛ים <S%H1314><s%> and of spices לָרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> abundance מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> great וְאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרָ֑ה <S%H3368><s%> and precious וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> never הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> had כַּבֹּ֣שֶׂם <S%H1314><s%> neither was there any such spice הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> that אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתְנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> gave מַֽלְכַּת־ <S%H4436><s%> as the queen שְׁבָ֖א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> And the servants [חִירָם כ] (חוּרָם֙ <S%H2438><s%> Hiram ק) וְעַבְדֵ֣י <S%H5650><s%> and the servants שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הֵבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> which brought זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> gold מֵאוֹפִ֑יר <S%H211><s%> from Ophir הֵבִ֛יאוּ <S%H935><s%> brought עֲצֵ֥י <S%H6086><s%> trees אַלְגּוּמִּ֖ים <S%H418><s%> algum וְאֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones יְקָרָֽה׃ <S%H3368><s%> and precious

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצֵ֨י <S%H6086><s%> trees הָֽאַלְגּוּמִּ֜ים <S%H418><s%> [of] the algum מְסִלּ֤וֹת <S%H4546><s%> terraces לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> to the house יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּלְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> palace הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and to the king's וְכִנֹּר֥וֹת <S%H3658><s%> and harps וּנְבָלִ֖ים <S%H5035><s%> and psalteries לַשָּׁרִ֑ים <S%H7891><s%> for singers וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and none נִרְא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> seen כָהֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> and there were none such לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> before בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וְהַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לְמַֽלְכַּת־ <S%H4436><s%> to the queen שְׁבָ֗א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חֶפְצָהּ֙ <S%H2656><s%> all her desire אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׁאָ֔לָה <S%H7592><s%> whatsoever she asked מִלְּבַ֖ד <S%H905><s%> alone אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what הֵבִ֣יאָה <S%H935><s%> beside [that] which she had brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king וַֽתַּהֲפֹ֛ךְ <S%H2015><s%> So she turned וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went לְאַרְצָ֖הּ <S%H776><s%> to her own land הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he וַעֲבָדֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> she and her servants פ

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מִשְׁקַ֣ל <S%H4948><s%> Now the weight הַזָּהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> that came לִשְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon בְּשָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year אֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> in one שֵׁ֥שׁ <S%H8337><s%> was six מֵא֛וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> and threescore וָשֵׁ֖שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six כִּכְּרֵ֥י <S%H3603><s%> talents זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> of gold

לְבַ֞ד <S%H905><s%> alone מֵאַנְשֵׁ֧י <S%H376><s%> he הַתָּרִ֛ים <S%H8446><s%> Tokahath וְהַסֹּחֲרִ֖ים <S%H5503><s%> and merchants מְבִיאִ֑ים <S%H935><s%> brought וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַלְכֵ֤י <S%H4428><s%> And all the kings עֲרַב֙ <S%H6152><s%> of Arabia וּפַח֣וֹת <S%H6346><s%> and governors הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the country מְבִיאִ֛ים <S%H935><s%> brought זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver לִשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred צִנָּ֖ה <S%H6793><s%> targets זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold שָׁח֑וּט <S%H7820><s%> [of] beaten שֵׁ֤שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold שָׁח֔וּט <S%H7820><s%> [shekels] of beaten יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> went עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַצִּנָּ֥ה <S%H6793><s%> target הָאֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> to one

וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> And three מֵא֤וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred מָֽגִנִּים֙ <S%H4043><s%> shields זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> gold שָׁח֔וּט <S%H7820><s%> [made he of] beaten שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> [shekels] of gold יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> went עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמָּגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> shield הָאֶחָ֑ת <S%H259><s%> to one וַיִּתְּנֵ֣ם <S%H5414><s%> put הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And the king בְּבֵ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> them in the house יַ֥עַר <S%H3293><s%> of the forest הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon פ

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Moreover the king כִּסֵּא־ <S%H3678><s%> throne שֵׁ֖ן <S%H8127><s%> of ivory גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> a great וַיְצַפֵּ֖הוּ <S%H6823><s%> and overlaid זָהָ֥ב <S%H2091><s%> gold טָהֽוֹר׃ <S%H2889><s%> it with pure
